metadata.dc:author: Vega, F
García-Rayo, S
Gúrpide, A
Brugarolas, A
metadata.dc:description: A new case of spontaneous tumor regression (STR) occurring in a patient with multiple myeloma associated to an Staphylococcus Aureus infection. This case report fulfills the criteria of STR defined by Everson and Cole. The mechanisms of the STR remain unknown. This is the fifth case identified in our center.
metadata.dc:title: Regresión tumoral espontánea en un paciente con mieloma múltiple. Comunicación de un caso adicional.
[Spontaneous tumor regression in a patient with multiple myeloma. Report of another case].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de medicina de la Universidad de Navarra
